Articles.Content: Make a space PLANE and orbit Kerbin. Your plane must use stock parts only. No modding or hacks. You must use the Mk1 cockpit, and all your fuel has to come from 8 FL-T400 feul tanks. No more than 8. Once you've made an orbit around Kerbin, you have to safely land relativaly close to your take off point (The runway). Good luck!

There is already a very similar challenge that has been going for quite a while, so I don`t see any reason to double it: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/11214-The-K-Prize-100-reusable-spaceplane-to-orbit-and-back.

Plus, the 0.16 fuel bug makes the fuel tanks restrictions a bit pointless.
